leg.name: leg
leg.transformationDescription:
The skin around [npc.her] lower body starts to feel numb as it begins to turn pale, While focusing on [npc.her] legs [npc.she] fails to notice [npc.her] feet are shifting. Suddenly [npc.she] [npc.verb(hear)] ripping at [npc.her] feet as the skin around [npc.her] feet starts to deform as [npc.her] toes merge, [npc.her] legs follow suit as sections of skin on [npc.her] lower waist tear revealing [npc.legFullDescription] but also four nubs on [npc.her] waist as four more legs of the same appearance sprouted out of [npc.her] hips.
[npc.Name] now [npc.has] [npc.tailCount] chitnus, [style.boldHyena(spitbug broodmother legs and feet)], which are [npc.materialDescriptor] [npc.legFullDescription].
leg.bodyDescription: [npc.Her] six legs are [npc.materialCompositionDescriptor] [npc.legFullDescription(true)], and [npc.her] feet are formed into chitnus spitbug feet, complete with two toes and tough soles.
